welcomeMessage: I'll help you with {{taskTitle}}. Let me ask a few questions so I can tailor the experience.

questions.text: What's the main goal or outcome you want from this?
When do you need this by, or what's your timeline?
Any constraints or requirements I should know about?
Who else is involved, if anyone (e.g. team, client)?
Anything else that would help me assist you better?
